import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import {Table, Menu, Icon } from "semantic-ui-react"; import EmployerService from "../services/EmployerService"; export default function EmployerList() { const [employers, setEmployers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let employerService = new EmployerService() employerService .getEmployer .then((result) => setEmployers(result.data.data)).catch() }, []); return (
Şirket Adı Email Web Adres Telefon {employers.map(employer => ( {employer.companyName} {employer.email} {employer.webAddress} {employer.phoneNumber} ))} 1 2 3 4
); }
